START.name: First Room
START.desc: You wake up in an unfamilar room. The walls are dark. There is one window and two doors. One door is North. One door is South. You must choose a door! (Enter a direction).

LOC2.name: Kitchen
LOC2.desc: There is one exit. You see that there is a letter on the counter. You may READ the letter or EXIT the room.

LOC3.name: Kitchen
LOC3.desc: You pick up the letter. The letter says: 'There is one map of this property. It is inside the safe. There is a key inside the house. Do not let anyone see the map. You are not alone.' You may EXIT the room to begin searching.
